pull_request.title: First step in transition to ign-math

pullrequest.title: First step in transition to ign-math

pull_request.title: First step in transition to ign-math

update.description:
We will move to use the ign-math library in Gazebo6. This is the first pull request along this trajectory.

A `libignition-math-dev` debian is available.

**Things to note**

1. ign-math is now required
1. gazebo math is still available. The internal library will be deprecated in gazebo7, and removed in gazebo8.
1. There will a lot of files that get touched. I'll make many small pull requests, with this one being the largest.
1. Users will be affected. We follow the tick-tock model, so they will have plenty of time to migrate their code. 
    1. A migration tutorial will be created in the near future to help people transition.
    1. Examples will be added, as shown in this pull request.
1. We can also look forward to a migration of gazebo's transport system to ign-transport. 

**Update: New Jenkins with plugin test fix**
[Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-utopic-amd64-gpu-ati/639)
update.title: First step in transition to ign-math

pull_request.title: First step in transition to ign-math

pullrequest.title: First step in transition to ign-math

content.raw: We need to add `include_directories(${IGNITION-MATH_INCLUDE_DIRS})` to make sure that Gazebo compiles if `ignition-math` is not installed in a default directory.
content.html: We need to add include_directories(${IGNITION-MATH_INCLUDE_DIRS}) to make sure that Gazebo compiles if ignition-math is not installed in a default directory.

pullrequest.title: First step in transition to ign-math

content.raw:
cmake test too
~~~
diff -r 4eae408b21de test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Mar 23 09:51:03 2015 -0700
+++ b/test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Mar 23 09:59:14 2015 -0700
@@ -19,5 +19,6 @@
 
 include_directories(${GAZEBO_INCLUDE_DIRS})
 link_directories(${GAZEBO_LIBRARY_DIRS})
+set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${GAZEBO_CXX_FLAGS}")
 add_library(hello_world SHARED ../../testfiles/hello_world.cc)
 target_link_libraries(hello_world ${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES} ${Boost_LIBRARIES})
~~~
content.html:
cmake test too

diff -r 4eae408b21de test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt  Mon Mar 23 09:51:03 2015 -0700
+++ b/test/cmake/plugin/CMakeLists.txt  Mon Mar 23 09:59:14 2015 -0700
@@ -19,5 +19,6 @@

 include_directories(${GAZEBO_INCLUDE_DIRS})
 link_directories(${GAZEBO_LIBRARY_DIRS})
+set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${GAZEBO_CXX_FLAGS}")
 add_library(hello_world SHARED ../../testfiles/hello_world.cc)
 target_link_libraries(hello_world ${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES} ${Boost_LIBRARIES})

pull_request.title: First step in transition to ign-math

update.description:
We will move to use the ign-math library in Gazebo6. This is the first pull request along this trajectory.

A `libignition-math-dev` debian is available.

**Things to note**

1. ign-math is now required
1. gazebo math is still available. The internal library will be deprecated in gazebo7, and removed in gazebo8.
1. There will a lot of files that get touched. I'll make many small pull requests, with this one being the largest.
1. Users will be affected. We follow the tick-tock model, so they will have plenty of time to migrate their code. 
    1. A migration tutorial will be created in the near future to help people transition.
    1. Examples will be added, as shown in this pull request.
1. We can also look forward to a migration of gazebo's transport system to ign-transport. 

**Update: New Jenkins with plugin test fix**
[Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-utopic-amd64-gpu-ati/639)
update.title: First step in transition to ign-math

pullrequest.title: First step in transition to ign-math

content.raw: [Test failures](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/634/testReport/) related to building downstream code building gazebo plugins. I ran into this same problem with the branch discussed in #1529. There were some issues with `gazebo/math/Helpers.hh` conflicting with `ignition/math/Helpers.hh`.
content.html: Test failures related to building downstream code building gazebo plugins. I ran into this same problem with the branch discussed in #1529. There were some issues with gazebo/math/Helpers.hh conflicting with ignition/math/Helpers.hh.
